summary: REQ-38/39/40 appear implemented: backend UserProfile now includes optional apaSkillLevel and migration path sets null for old profiles; ProfileSetupDialog can view/edit/save name + default APA SL with English labels; APA PracticeStartPage auto-fills Player 1 SL from saved profile once while respecting manual overrides.

hallucinated_features.description: Added backend data migration module and wired actor migration logic.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requires extending the profile type/APIs but does not explicitly request adding a separate migration module/file.

hallucinated_features.description: Added UI convenience buttons/handlers to auto-fill player names from the signed-in user profile (“Use my name”) on APA Practice start page.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to auto-fill the primary player APA skill level; it does not request name auto-fill shortcuts.
